import PropTypes from'prop-types';import{useEffect}from'react';import{useLocation}from'react-router-dom';// ==============================|| NAVIGATION - SCROLL TO TOP ||============================== //
var ScrollTop=function ScrollTop(_ref){var children=_ref.children;var location=useLocation();var pathname=location.pathname;useEffect(function(){window.scrollTo({top:0,left:0,behavior:'smooth'});},[pathname]);return children||null;};ScrollTop.propTypes={children:PropTypes.node};export default ScrollTop;
